content: MQN-R Channel connector Stainless steel (A4) channel connector for joining any elements with a butterfly opening ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Designed to be simple, compact and time-saving Universal – one connection element for all MQ strut channels Universal – one push button for all connectors and MQ installation channels Holds securely once it has been pressed, turned and tightened correctly Fewer parts and high flexibility Applications Connecting stainless steel MQ brackets, angles and bases to MQ profiles Connection element for U-frame/crossbeam structures Connecting strut channels and structural elements ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tightening torque: 30 ft-lbf Thread connection - M: M10 Material composition: Screw: A4-70 - DIN ISO 3506-1, Nut: 1.4581 (A4) - DIN EN 10283, Plate: 1.4404 (A4) – EN 10088, AISI 316L Technical Data | Tightening torque | 30 ft-lbf | Thread connection - M | M10 | Material composition | Screw: A4-70 - DIN ISO 3506-1, Nut: 1.4581 (A4) - DIN EN 10283, Plate: 1.4404 (A4) – EN 10088, AISI 316L | Surface finish | Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel | Environmental conditions | Outdoor high pollution (C4 – high / C5) | Wrench size | 17 mm | Weight | 0.17 lb ### ITEMS- 304012 - Push button MQN-R SS316 - Package Size 25 pc
